casebody.data:
LOVERING-JOHNSON, INC., Appellant, v. Donald C. WINTER, Secretary of the Navy, Appellee. No. 2006-1268. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. March 27, 2007.

Before MAYER, Circuit Judge, PLAGER and CLEVENGER, Senior Circuit Judges.

*993Judgment

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
